sys_update_xml.name: sys_email_layout_f4a2950cdb64130093da55d0cf9619ea
sys_update_xml.payload:
true #snc_notification_preference { text-decoration: none; } #snc_notification_unsubscribe { text-decoration: none; } .army_classification_banner { text-decoration: none; font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: medium; color: #cccccc; background-color: #007f00; text-align: center; padding: 2px; border: 1px solid #003f00; margin: 0px; }
CLASSIFICATION: UNCLASSIFIED//FOR OFFICIAL USE ONLY
${notification:body}

${NOTIF_UNSUB} | ${NOTIF_PREFS}
CLASSIFICATION: UNCLASSIFIED//FOR OFFICIAL USE ONLY
]]>Adds footer to email containing links to unsubscribe and notification preferences along with security classification.Classification Unsubscribe and Preferencessys_email_layouterwinel_da2018-02-23 00:57:26f4a2950cdb64130093da55d0cf9619ea0Classification Unsubscribe and Preferencesglobalglobalsys_email_layout_f4a2950cdb64130093da55d0cf9619eaerwinel_da2018-02-23 00:57:26

sys_update_xml.name: sys_email_layout_62e1950cdb64130093da55d0cf9619e8
sys_update_xml.payload:
true #snc_notification_preference { text-decoration: none; font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: medium; color: #278efc; } #snc_notification_unsubscribe { text-decoration: none; font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: medium; color: #278efc; } .army_classification_banner { text-decoration: none; font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: medium; color: #cccccc; background-color: #007f00; text-align: center; padding: 2px; border: 1px solid #003f00; margin: 0px; }
CLASSIFICATION: UNCLASSIFIED//FOR OFFICIAL USE ONLY
${notification:body}

${NOTIF_UNSUB} | ${NOTIF_PREFS}
CLASSIFICATION: UNCLASSIFIED//FOR OFFICIAL USE ONLY
]]>Adds classification header to top and bottom.Classification Unsubscribe and Preferences Helveticasys_email_layouterwinel_da2018-02-23 00:54:1762e1950cdb64130093da55d0cf9619e80Classification Unsubscribe and Preferences Helveticaglobalglobalsys_email_layout_62e1950cdb64130093da55d0cf9619e8erwinel_da2018-02-23 00:54:17
